Quantitative Analysis of Anthropological Data

In this course, I learned basic statistical methods using SPSS. I was able to determine would kind of tests to perform on the data depending on the circumstances. This included choosing between:

  • Hypothesis Testing
  • Simple Linear Regression
  • ANOVA

For my final project, I got to research my own question and choose a dataset to analyze and answer it. My paper can be found here.
